
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
gene_features <- read_tsv("~/Dropbox/PPiSeq_02/Working_data/geneFeatures_022415_EK.txt") %>% 
    rename(YORF=X1)
consistency <- read_csv("~/Dropbox/PPiSeq_02/Working_data/networks/multigraph_node_consistency.csv")
```

```{r}
left_join(consistency,gene_features,by="YORF") %>%
    { summary(
        glm(data=.[,-1],
            formula=consistency_across_conditions~
                `Yeast conservation`+
                `Coexpression degree`+
                `Number of complexes`+
                `Number of unique domains`+
                `dN/dS`+
                `Protein disorder`+
                `Gasch expression variance (environ)`+
                `Protein abundance`+
                `Essential`+
                `Complex member`+
                `Duplicated`
                ,
            )) 
    }
```
